How to use the NCT Seller App

The NCT Seller App is a platform for sellers to manage their online store. The app is designed to be user-friendly and easy to use. Below is a step-by-step guide on how to use the app.

Step 1: Login to the app

To login to the app, you need to have a valid username and password. If you have not yet registered, you can do so by clicking on the "Register" button. If you have already registered, you can login using your username and password.

Step 2: Navigate to the dashboard

After logging in, you will be redirected to the dashboard. The dashboard is the main page of the app and provides an overview of your store. You can view your orders, products, and support tickets from the dashboard.

Step 3: View orders

To view your orders, click on the "Orders" link on the left sidebar. You will be taken to a page that shows all the orders you have received. You can view the details of each order by clicking on the "View" button.

Step 4: View products

To view your products, click on the "Products" link on the left sidebar. You will be taken to a page that shows all the products you have listed. You can view the details of each product by clicking on the "View" button.

Step 5: Create a listing

To create a listing, click on the "Create Listing" button on the products page. You will be taken to a page where you can enter the details of your product. You can add images, set a price, and add a description of your product.

Step 6: View support tickets

To view your support tickets, click on the "Support Tickets" link on the left sidebar. You will be taken to a page that shows all the support tickets you have received. You can view the details of each ticket by clicking on the "View" button.

Step 7: Respond to support tickets

To respond to a support ticket, click on the "Respond" button on the ticket page. You will be taken to a page where you can enter your response. You can also attach files to your response.
